assessment.text:

We encourage you to explore this module thoroughly, revisiting those areas that may require a deeper understanding for you. The more you know, the more results you'll see on the sales floor! You can choose to exit to the assessment at any time.

page.title: Introduction
page.name: s1p1
page.body:
For your customer, the question they have about a smartphone isn't, "How does it work?" it's "What can it do for me?

Learn how apps can turn "a smartphone" into "my smartphone."

page.title: What Are Apps?
page.name: s1p2
page.body: An app (short for application) is software that performs a specific task - like interacting with Facebook, checking the weather, playing music or editing and sharing photos. Apps can turn a standard device into a tool that uniquely your own.

page.title: Where Do Apps Come From?
page.name: s1p3
page.body: There are four major platforms and each has their own marketplace where users can buy and download apps specifically for their device.
page.text: Tap and drag to see more content
Selling Tip: Not all apps are on all platforms, so be sure to understand what apps are available for the device or platform your customer is considering.

page.title: Why Do Apps Matter?
page.name: s1p4
page.body: Apps personalize a smartphone, so while customers might own identical devices, they will use them in different ways.
page.text:
• Business Travelers might be interested in weather, budgeting and finance, airline and maps apps.
  • Sports Fans might want apps for league news, scores, and game schjedules.
  • An Aspiring Chef might have apps to store recipes, photograph dishes, read or create reviews of local restaurants.

page.title: Entertainment
page.name: s2p1
page.body: With Entertainment apps, you can enjoy content - or create your own. Music. Video. Books. Whether you're looking to be entertained or do the entertaining, there's an app to help make it happen.
page.text: (Google Play Store top free entertainment apps in the U.S. on 9/25/13)

page.title: Games
page.name: s2p2
page.body: Gaming apps include casual time-passers and immersive console-quality gaming experiences. Playing games on a smartphone can happen anywhere, anytime – no sofa required. Whether you want to just play a word game with friends for a few minutes or you're a hard-core gamer up for an all-nighter, there's something for everybody.
page.text: (Google Play Store top games apps in the U.S. on 10/2/13)

page.title: Productivity
page.name: s2p3
page.body: Productivity apps help you get stuff done – like making lists, tracking time, writing notes or creating a budget. Many store data in the cloud, or communicate directly with your computer so your information is always available.
page.text: (Windows Phone store top paid tools + productivity apps in the U.S. on 10/2/13)

page.title: Hobbies & Lifestyle
page.name: s2p4
page.body: Apps keep things you care about closeby. Journal thoughts, capture inspirational snapshots, shop, and tune in to content and information. Or, customize your device with backgrounds or icons that suit your passion.
page.text: (Google Play Store top lifestyle apps in the U.S. on 9/25/13)

page.title: Social Networking
page.name: s2p5
page.body: One of the most popular uses for a smartphone is staying in touch - and this is an area your customer will probably be very interested in. Social networking apps let you update your status, check-in at favorite spots and broadcast spontaneous photos or videos.
page.text: (BlackBerry World top social apps in the U.S. on 9/25/13)

page.title: Health & Fitness
page.name: s2p6
page.body: Apps can help track what you're eating, motivate with a workout and encouragement, track your mileage, pace, and then guide you to a good night's sleep. Whether you're looking to shed a few pounds or train for a marathon, apps can help get you on the road to a healthy life.
page.text: (Google Play store top health & fitness apps in the U.S. on 10/2/13)

page.title: Education
page.name: s2p7
page.body: A smartphone can a constant educational companion - giving you access to so many learning tools. Learn a new skill or language. Explore the human body, a far-off country, or virtually dissect a frog. Apps can take you from "curious" to "expert".
page.text: (Windows Phone store top paid education apps in the U.S. on 9/25/13)

page.title: Kids
page.name: s2p8
page.body: From the amusing to the educational, kids apps deliver a whole new kind of interactive experience. They can see their favorite character come to life on the smartphone. From learning their ABC's to solving puzzles, kids apps turn your smartphone into a virtual playground.
page.text: (Windows Phone store top paid kids + family apps in the U.S. on 10/2/13)

page.title: Unique… just like you.
page.name: s3p1
page.body: Apps are what make your smartphone, well, yours. And with so many different kinds of apps available you can make your standard device into something that’s truly personal.

page.title: Congratulations
page.name: s3p2
page.body: You've finished this training on apps.
page.text: Selling Tip: Remember - your customer is curious about what they can do with a new smartphone. Help them understand how apps create a personalized experience. Ask about their interests and show them features that excite them.
